document.full_text: american hunter mahan fired seven birdies and charged into a two-stroke lead after 11 holes of the storm-delayed opening round of the wgc-cadillac championship at doral on thursday.
document.title: mahan grabs two-shot lead at weather-hit doral
lines_and_colors: american hunter mahan fired seven birdies and charged into a two-stroke lead after 11 holes of the storm-delayed opening round of the wgc-cadillac championship at doral on thursday.
